entry.title: Red Wine Tea - Tin Can
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: Black Tea
Price: 6.91

Blending the natural essence of red wine with premium black tea, Red Wine Tea offers a distinctive and refined taste experience. Fruity and floral notes intertwine with earthy undertones, while hibiscus petals contribute a smooth, rounded flavor profile.

Versatile and aromatic, this tea can be enjoyed hot or cold - making it a sophisticated choice for elegant gatherings or a moment of indulgence.

entry.title: Aroma Black & Green Tea Assortment Individual Envelope - Tea Bags
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips
Type:
Price: 24.99

Golden Tips Tea was established with a mission to epitomise the art of drinking gourmet teas and an endeavour to make available the luxury of pure & unblended single-origin Indian teas to connoisseurs across the globe. With a commitment to serve only the finest & freshest picks, each tea is selected with precision and packed at source within days of their harvest. Our expert team of tasters & master blenders navigate & assess each tea tasting several hundred cups every week to select those from the prime tea growing season which are destined to bear the Golden Tips stamp. A brand with passion, ethics and a heritage of over 80 years.
 
Mint Green Tea:- Fine Green tea flavoured with mint. 
 
Darjeeling Green Tea:- Fine Green Tea flavoured with citrusy lemon.
 
Jasmine Green Tea:- Fine Green Tea with a mellowed taste.
 
Darjeeling Black Tea:- Bright Colouring Darjeeling summer tea with a pleasant aroma and taste.
 
English Breakfast Tea:- Initially known as Breakfast Tea, English Breakfast.
 
Earl Grey Black Tea:- Bright Colouring black orthodox tea flavoured with the oil of bergamot.

Each Tea contains 5 Teabags

entry.title: Saffron Cardamom Exotic Chai India's Authentic Spiced Tea - Tin Can (Free Exotic Darjeeling Tea 35g)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Teas India
Type: Chai Teas
Price: 39.99

Health Benefits
  • Prevent Cold and Nasal Congestion.
  • Antioxidant-rich helps prevent cell damage.
  • Boost Energy and Immunity.
How to prepare a perfect cup:
  • Mix one portion of milk & two portions of water & set to boil.
  • When on boil add one teaspoon of Masala Chai and boil for another minute.
  • Add sugar as per taste & strain into a cup.
  • Best consumed with milk.

entry.title: FLAVOURY FINE FETTLE - Six Refreshing Fruit Infusions
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea Co. (P) Ltd.
Type: Tea & Infusions
Price: 10.99

Introducing FLAVOURY FINE FETTLE - a collection of the finest Indian herbs and Floral Petals carefully crafted to bring out a perfect blend of Aroma, Taste, and Health benefits. Each pack is air-sealed and beautifully packaged in a gift box, 

Floral Delight (black tea): Classic rose with a touch of sweetness (stevia) and tartness (hibiscus)

Amethyst Ardor (purple tea): Naturally caffeine-free, known for its delicate floral aroma and slightly sweet taste.

Green Grass (lemon green tea): Invigorating green tea with a refreshing citrus twist (lemon).

Green Blush (green tea): Romantic blend of green tea and rose petals, offering a calming floral fragrance and smooth taste.

Empyrean Azure (blue tea): Naturally caffeine-free butterfly pea flower tea with a subtle floral aroma and beautiful blue color.

Hibiscus Rose (black tea): Tangy and refreshing black tea with vibrant hibiscus flowers, resulting in a beautiful ruby red color.

entry.title: Mint Matcha Japanese Green Tea
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips
Type: Green Tea
Price: 9.20 - 17.00 (2 variants)

Matcha is a fine stone-ground green tea powder from Japan. The refreshing blend of Mint Matcha is highly beneficial to health and helps in boosting the immune system. Since it is more concentrated in antioxidants, Matcha tea is believed to have 10 times the nutritional value of green tea.
Exclusively Imported from Japan.

A soothing blend of pure green tea and a variety of exotic medicinal herbs from the Himalayas in India. This light and mellow herbal green tea is characteristic of a rich grassy aroma with sweetish and rosy undertones, a smooth flavour with fairly bright Colour in the cup. 

Elevate your tea ritual with an experience that transcends the ordinary. Discover a moment of quiet luxury where each cup invites you to unwind and reconnect with nature’s artistry. The intricate blend embodies a journey of sensory delight, evoking a refined atmosphere of heritage and modern elegance. Its serene allure makes it the perfect companion for moments of reflection, celebration, or simply savoring the finer things in life.
Disclaimer:
Brocade fabric design may change from time to time and may not be the same as shown in the website.

entry.title: Chocolate Flavoured Black Tea - Tin Can
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea Co. (P) Ltd.
Type: Black Tea
Price: 9.75

A refreshing blend of high grow full leaf black tea combined with natural extracts of Chocolate. This bright Colouring tea makes for a robust and flavoury cup.
Brewing Notes:
Put 2 grams of Chocolate Black Tea Leaves in a cup. Pour 200ml of freshly boiled water over the leaves. Steep for 3-5 Minutes. Add sugar or honey as sweetener. Ice cubes may be added to chill. Best served without or with very little milk.
